reviews.review: thrilling!

I have played this game since around when Michael Myers came out. I loved it. Easily became my favorite video game I've ever played and found a new way of spending all of my nights with friends. Back then it was very fun and enjoyable despite not having as much killer/survivor variety as it does now. I am giving it a thumbs down now because it just isn't enjoyable for me anymore. I am tired of hearing that things will get fixed in the game such as match making and I still have issues with that. I also feel like it is becoming more and more in favor of the killer winning which is tiring as you have to be ridiculously immersed in order to win sometimes and that just isn't my playing style. I will continue to play this game as I have a love-hate relationship with it. I just wish the developers would listen to their community more is all. All in all a fun game but hard to enjoy at times.

Un jeu qui est tombé bien bas... J'ai connu le jeu il y a bien longtemps, mais je ne peux décemment pas vous le recommander. Le gameplay de tueur consiste à attraper quelqu'un une fois et ensuite le camper jusqu'à sa mort (Alors que le jeu n'est pas pensé comme ça, mais il récompense tellement ce genre de comportement). Le gameplay de tueur est donc ennuyeux à souhait et celui de survivant frustrant à la seconde ou on croise le tueur. Et j'écris ces lignes alors que je joue avec des amis. N'espérais même pas une seconde d'amusement avec des randoms qui ne jouent pas en équipe (Même pas de chat vocal). 
Tous ces problèmes combiné à la négligence des développeurs mènera ce jeu à sa perte...

This game has a ton of flaws but it can be redeemed if you tend to ignore certain factors or hope the devs fix it. It's still a fun game but sometimes can make you wanna rip out your hair.
Pros-
Fun game
Lets you be a killer and use perks for your playstyle
can play up to 5 people in a private match 4 online
New killers recently seem to be new and interesting nothing cookie cutter and have been reasonably strong
Cons-
Heavily survivor sided game 
Tons of bugs that can sometimes be gamebreaking
Toxic community (both sides) I've seen killers in my hundreds of hours do things like face camp but not as many survivors I see playing killer and survivor either bullying new killers or tbagging them and just trying to be a nuisance(some people are really nice sucks they are outweighed)
Games balancing really needs work especially with 4 man teams against a poor killer(2 man teams can probably equal the power of a decent killer 3-4 mans over power them easilly if they aren't bots)
Some items in the game or mechanics just aren't really fair for both sides some add ons on items arent very fun or fair (recent killer nerfs to certain addons like spirit were deserved and nice toolboxes as well) The main problems are ebony moris which let you kill someone after their first hook up to everyone in the match but also the Key mechanic where people can just absolutely destroy a killers score by finding a closed hatch

Overall its mainly just the games balancing issues that you experience sometimes playing either side or the toxic players, although you get this in other games it feels more apparent in this one. I would recommend this game beside these issues at its core still fun, some killers are an absolute blast to play if you can deal with toxic survivors or not ranking up every game or winning you can still have a great time. If you play in a group of survivors its still fun but not the most engaging gameplay just sitting on a gen. If you have friends give custom games a try where you can have fun with them in a private match where you can do what you want with any perks dlc or not and your friends.

Ett väldigt roligt spel att spela speciellt med vänner. Men det finns en sak som stör mig otroligt mycket. Nämligen att man kopplas bort från utvecklarnas servrar fast att man har en fullt fungerande internetuppkoppling. Därefter blir man avstängd i 5 minuter. Det är helt sjukt att man bli straffad för att utvecklarna har dåliga servrar. Jag skulle gärna rekommendera detta spel, men det är tyvärr inte möjligt i nuläget med dessa problem.

《黎明杀机》在最初设计时并没有着重考虑面的运营，定位就是一款售价20美元的作品。后来随着玩家的增多，《黎明杀机》才慢慢开始转变成一款服务型游戏。结果就是现在的游戏与最初的设想已经有了天壤之别，而这些变化是由玩家主导的，制作组做的只是服务，这就是他对‘Game as a Service’的理解。在谈及最近很有争议的内购问题时，Mathieu Cote说《黎明杀机》没有内购，也不会向那个方向发展。但他并不否定内购模式的存在，内购的确让一些游戏得到了很好的市场表现。最后，对于《黎明杀机》目前的状态和今后的方向，Mathieu Cote认为《黎明杀机》才刚刚进入佳境，未来他们会继续倾听玩家的反馈，并通过更新不断向玩家呈现更多接地气的内容
𝑑𝑖𝑣𝑒𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑑𝑜, 𝑚𝑎𝑠 𝑡𝑎𝑚𝑏𝑒𝑚 𝑚𝑢𝑖𝑡𝑜 𝑒𝑠𝑡𝑟𝑒𝑠𝑠𝑎𝑛𝑡𝑒.

Ich bin mit dem Spiel im Grunde sehr zufrieden! meine Erwartungen wurden erfüllt und zusätzlich gibt es auch regelmäßige Updates und Erweiterungen, sowie Events. Die Grafik im Game ist auch sehr gut und Düster atmosphärisch gestaltet. Für Personen die sich überlegen das Spiel zu kaufen kann ich das auf jeden fall empfehlen, sofern sie Fan von Multiplayer, Strategie, Action und oder Horror Spielen sind.
